function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate government interventions for revitalizing the entrepreneurial ecosystem","category":"Weak local decision-making mechanisms","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of international cooperation in responding to contagious diseases","category":"Lack of global governance and coordination","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Delayed decision making and information disclosure during the early stages of an outbreak","category":"Weak local decision-making mechanisms","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Policy variables at a more granular level than infection data","category":"Weak local decision-making mechanisms","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Community involvement in governance without clear coordination","category":"Weak local decision-making mechanisms","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-compliance due to deterrent effect of measures","category":"Lack of transparency and clarity","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Infection importations from neighboring countries","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decrease specific barriers for startups may lead to relaxed regulations and oversight, potentially compromising public health and safety standards.","category":"Ineffectiveness of interventions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited open government data projects focused on disaster management","category":"Lack of transparency and clarity","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of multi-sectoral collaboration","category":"Lack of coordination and consistency in mitigation measures","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Survey focused on new york metropolitan area, limiting generalizability to other regions","category":"Weak local decision-making mechanisms","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate communication","category":"Ineffectiveness of interventions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Deployment of military for covid-19 supervision","category":"Ineffectiveness of interventions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Division within the eu regarding energy transition","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fraught and contested use of the european stability mechanism esm for financing emergency health costs.","category":"Global coordination challenges","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Heterogeneous restrictions leading to varied study results","category":"Lack of coordination and consistency in mitigation measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of disclosure of competing financial interests or personal relationships","category":"Trust and transparency challenges","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited implementation of contingency theory and principal-agent theory in public challenges","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited national reception of wbe in the u.s. for covid-19 tracking","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Scarce personnel to monitor compliance with protocols","category":"Ineffectiveness of interventions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent definitions and differences in intervention strength between challenges","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Relative weakness of the ecdc compared to international counterparts , cdc and discrepancies between member state responses to challenges","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global pandemic of covid-19 causing daily loss of lives and economic downturn","category":"Globalization challenges","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of mechanisms","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global coordination, political challenges","category":"Global coordination challenges","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disagreements during the
